ðŸ“– Summary: Rustypaste is a minimal, self-hostable file upload and pastebin service written in Rust. It supports features like file uploading, URL shortening, setting expiration times for files, one-shot links, MIME type guessing, and optional authentication. It can be deployed via Docker or built from source.
